title: error: internal compiler error: src/librustc/ty/context.rs:513: node_type: no type for node `expr 8 (hir_id=HirId { owner: DefIndex(3061), local_id: 87 })`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Running `cargo clippy` on a [scryer-prolog]() Rust project with a latest master (commit https://github.com/mthom/scryer-prolog/commit/5ec4dfedb0f7f2440316dc02792869ca45b91df0) checkout makes compiler fail:
```

[i] ℤ RUST_BACKTRACE=full cargo clippy --verbose                                                                                                                                                                     14:34:32 via 𝗥 v1.39.0 
       Fresh semver-parser v0.7.0
       Fresh cfg-if v0.1.10
```
